author: remm
msg: - HEAD never has a response body.

author: remm
msg: - Javadoc will use the same classpath as the compilation task.

author: remm
msg: - If an error occurs when parsing the chunk length, don't call close(), and directly
- Don't attempt to read bytes when closing the stream if none are available.
This should fix issues when doing a HEAD request, which contain bogus content-length
Many thanks to Eylon Stroh <estroh at nuance.com> for the bug report

author: remm
msg: Patch submitted by Dirk Verbeeck <dirk.verbeeck at the-ecorp.com>
